summary: THE DASH BOARD DEVELOPED IT'S FIRT CRACK IN MAY OR APRIL OF 2011, SINCE THEN IT CONTINUES TO CRACK.  IF IT CONTINUES TO CRACK I FEAR THAT SMALL PIECES WILL DISLODGE WHICH MAY CREATE A HAZARD FOR ANY OCCUPANT IN THE VEHICLE.  SUCH AS A PIECE LODGING IN THEIR EYE AND POSSIBLE LOSS OF EYE SIGHT.
